overview: A tourist bus, on an excursion to Ouro Preto, makes its stop at a gas station where a team of artists in acrobatic and humorous shows takes an interest in the girls, all very beautiful and the daughters of millionaires. The boys being inconsequential, they immediately decide to take part in the tour, even if by force. The driver, realizing that he is being the victim of "hijackers", tries to allay the fear among the passengers and makes the trip go smoothly...
title: Animais do Sexo
